title: PESSAT slot booking trouble, please help me out.

comments.body: As far as i know states outside Karnataka have only one test date(which was July 1st for Chandigarh) where as in Bengaluru you had 20 seperate dates out of which you could choose one. So I assume that you wouldn't get another test date and I guess the only option is to travel to Bengaluru and take the test.
so is there any chance to change my center to Delhi, as one of my friend who lives in delhi having the exam on 8th and 9th july

Bro you've messed up plain and simple. PESSAT occurs on one and one date alone outside Karnataka. And that's the only opportunity to take it, it can't be rescheduled. Although it's a private uni it's exams work the same way as most national exams. they may or may not reconsider but you shouldn't have waited till exam day to travel to exam location
You'll have to travel to Bangalore if you want another date. It takes place only once outside Karnataka
Why are you going through so much effort for joining this shithole lmao
